Text: RE Response to PX Answer to Chargeback ComplaintEisenberg has said much the same thing to one of our clients saying that the PX filed not the trust and the the bankruptcy relates only to the PX in its own capacity and not as trustee Eisenberg plans to file some sort of motion soon to clarify this Original Message From Ronald Carroll mailto Sent March AM To Andrea Settanni Jeffrey Watkiss Kimberly Curry Subject Re Response to PX Answer to Chargeback Complaint I spoke with Lisa Urich inhouse attorney for the PX She said that the bankruptcy filing did not list the collateral or dollars received as part of the PXs clearinghouse function as assets and has been advised by the PXs bankruptcy attorney that they are not involved in the bankruptcy action She said that the purpose of the bankruptcy filing relates only to vendors Jeffrey Watkiss PM The Chapter filing I suspect will receive a lot of attention on the pm call Howard Shapiro PM Thanks for the draft We are informed that the PX has filed in Chapter It may argue that FERCs proceedings fall within the automatic stay and that even if they dont the accounting we are proposing inappropriately overlaps the role of the bankruptcy court This message contains information which may be confidential and privileged Unless you are the addressee or authorized to receive for the addressee you may not use copy or disclose to anyone the message or any information contained in the message If you have received the message in error please advise the sender by reply email mofocom and delete the message Thank you very much
